ICTS HDX and Codes: Lecture Notes on Codes 1

Below are the lecture notes on Coding Theory made during the ICTS HDX and Codes school. These lectures were taken by Prof. Swastik Kopparty.

Topics:

  • Definition of an Error-Correcting Code, Bounds on Codes
  • Linear Codes, Reed-Solomon Codes
  • Expander Codes (Sipser-Spielman) and their decoding algorithm
  • Tanner Codes and their decoding algorithm, Tensor Codes
  • Codes with \(\delta = \frac{1}{2} - \epsilon\)
  • Gap Codes

Click here to open the pdf in a new tab.
